changes: An empty option dropdown item will now have the correct placeholder text color.
Updated internal dependencies.
Added a new prop labelTransformation that can be used to transform the shown label of the selected dropdown item.
Added support for images in dropdown.
Fixed icons (and now images) not showing in current value of input field if the item.value was of type number.
Properly expose typings for web components.
Added new prop isRequired.
Added support for a dropdown item to have value=null. When that item is selected in the overlay, the input will be cleared and the placeholder shown.
Fixed an issue where the popup sometimes did not align horizontally on initial render.
Adjusted label typography and error typography to be more consistent across the design system.
fixes: The total hight og the input elements has been adjusted. Adjust your design to accommodate for the new input height.

changes: Updated internal dependencies.
Deprecation warnings removed for old props deprecated more than 6 months ago.
Updated internal dependencies.
Change label size and position for the small dropdown.
fixes: The small dropdown will be taller. You may therefore want to check that the page layout is not severely affected by this.

changes: Theme color fix
Fixed a bug where the checkboxes inside the dropdown would have incorrect styles after switching themes.
Small input label missing background color.
Dark theme support.
Updated internal dependencies.
Updated internal dependencies.
Fixed a bug where the text selection inside the input would be invisible.
Updated internal dependencies.
Now exporting some types for use with web component. They are available from import {} from '@elvia/elvis-dropdown';.
Fixed a bug where errorOptions would lose its default values.
Size type bugfix introduced in version 7.0.0.
Changed prop isCompact to instead be size='small | medium'.
Changed the way icons are used in dropdown. Use the icon html string instead of the icon name, this way we reduce the package size greatly.
fixes: icon: 'powerline' can be directly replaced by <i class='e-icon e-icon--powerline e-icon--sm'></i>

changes: Fixed the color of the error state icon.
Added support for dark theme.
Fixed a bug where the check mark would have incorrect size.
Fixed a bug where the check mark would have incorrect styles when disabled.
Updated internal dependencies.
Set disabled icon color when dropdown is disabled
Set correct type for selectAllOption in wrapper config.
Hide 'Select all' option when performing a filter that gives no results.

Added the errorOptions object which introduces the props errorOptions.hasErrorPlaceholder option to the errorOptions can be set to false to remove the padding under the form field, errorOptions.isErrorState that sets the dropdown i an errorState, and errorOptions.text that replaces errorMessage.
Added the ariaLabel prop that can be used to give the dropdown a accessible name.
Fixed a bug where a disabled checkbox would receive hover styles while focused using the keyboard.
Fixed a bug where the dropdown could not be re-opened if initially opened by keyboard.
Minor internal accessability improvements.
Changed how icons are used internally. This change should improve the bundle size.
Use shared overlay component.
Use shared backdrop component.
The component config has been moved into each component.
Fix issues with the back-button which is visible in mobile view.
Fixed a bug where the button that opens a submenu was not disabled correctly.
Support number values.
Updated dependencies on internal packages.
Improve performance for large lists.
Added support for React 18.
Allow dropdown to be smaller than 170px

Rewrote component to remove dependency to react-select. This means that the DOM and CSS is completely new, so if any deep CSS selectors have been used, these must be removed. Ask the design team if this means that you need a new dropdown feature.
The property selectAllOption now only accepts a string to define the label for the select all option.
The property value now only accepts strings for selected value. This can also be a list of strings for multiple select.
Use @elvia/elvis-component-wrapper@^3.0.0.
Bumped version dependency of @elvia/elvis-tooltip to 1.0.8.
Use @elvia/elvis-toolbox@5.0.0
Bumped version dependency of @elvia/elvis-tooltip to 1.0.7.
Bumped version dependency of @elvia/elvis-tooltip to enable support for newline characters in the tooltips on options.
Added support for a tooltip on each option to display information when hovering an option with a status icon.
Moved the label for the compact Dropdown up to match the designs in Figma.
Padding was added over the compact Dropdown to prevent the label from overflowing.
fixes: The change impacts the total height of the compact Dropdown and other compact input elements from the Elvia design system. Ensure to adjust the spacing and/or alignment in your design to account for the larger size of all compact input elements.

changes: Update dependency @elvia/elvis-toolbox to 4.0.0
Added support for adding a button to the bottom of the dropdown item list that can be used to load more items.
Changed how the onItemHover is triggered.
Fixed a wrong hover state for disabled dropdown item in multiselect dropdown.
Added support for status icons on each dropdown option.
Now dispatching an event onItemHover when an option is hovered.
Fix version dependency on @elvia/elvis-icon.
Added support for disabling dropdown options.
Upgrade to toolbox v2.0.0
Added support for CSP style nonce. It is added by setting the variable window.__webpack_nonce__ in the document head to the nonce value.
Republish due to error in the previous version
Added isFullWidth-prop
Updated design of the selected value in the input field for open dropdown when the dropdown is not multiselect, and is searchable.
Reworked the way the component is declared as a module, and how types are exported for React.
Fixed the color of the icon in selected dropdown value when the dropdown is disabled.
Added new props: selectAllOption, allOptionsSelectedLabel, and placeholderIcon.
Fixed the placement of the label for compact size dropdown.
Refactored the styled components.
Bumped the dependencies on @elvia/elvis-colors, @elvia/elvis-component-wrapper, @elvia/elvis-icon, and @elvia/elvis-typography.
The selected value in the dropdown now gets cut off with an ellipsis (...) if it is too long, instead of just cutting off without any indicator.
Fixed bug where the selected item would jump out of its position
Fixed bug where the placeholder text would jump out of its position for searchable dropdown
Fixed bug where valueOnChange did not get called unless value prop was set
Fixed bug where dropdown gave a valueOnChange callback with undefined value on initiation
Fixed bug where items list array was empty and returned no found icon
Fixed issue where long labels created scroll in options
Bumped the dependency on @elvia/elvis-typography. This adds support for mobile font properties.
Renamed props for more consistent naming conventions.
Adjusted padding in the value container.
Added support for native events in React.
Now possible to add icon in the options object to display icons in the dropdown options. Note that you need to pass icons to all objects in the options array to display icons.
Added new prop 'hasSelectAllOption', which adds a select all-option to a multiselect dropdown.
Now using elvis-colors package for all colors.
Added new prop 'isSearchable', allows user to enter text and filter options based on search term.
Fixed an issue causing problems for events in non-React environments for props with falsy values. This  update bumps the dependency on @elvia/elvis-component-wrapper.
Selected values now have correct font color if disabled.
Now using correct type for webcomponent wrapper for better internal IntelliSense.
Now using elvis-icon package for internal icons.
Added inlineStyle and className props.
Updated dependencies.
Refactoring.
Updated tokens declarations.
Added unit tests.
Now using elvis-colors package for colors.
Now using elvis-typography package for typography.
Web component wrapper fix.
Fix so that width of the dropdown field is 100% up to max-width always, to be consistent with other  input-components. Can possibly break alignment where it is used.
Placeholder now has no defined default value
Max-width updated to 448px, to match other input-components max-width
Added type declaration support for dropdown component
Adjusted max width of placeholders and single value in dropdown.
Fix for width-bug inside a flex-container.
Updated styled component version to fix warning about different versions.
Updated red validation color to new elvia red (#EE0701)
Fixed icon bug in dropdown
First stable version.
